adoration: We praise You, O God, our Heavenly Father, Who sits enthroned upon the Cherubim.  Before You all the earth trembles and quakes.  For Your name is great and awesome and Your holiness is beyond us our minds, our words, our hearts are only ever able to capture small glimmers of it.  The whole earth in all its vastness is low before You.  It is but Your footstool. You love justice and establish righteousness, yet You forgive those who keep Your testimonies and call upon Your name.  So hear us now as we do so, singing together the prayer our Lord, Your Son, has given us   The Lord's Prayer     (arr. Nikolai Kedrov)

For as the heavens are high above the earth, so great is His steadfast love toward those who fear Him; as far as the east is from the west, so far has He removed our transgressions from us.
